pullRequest.title: Update block damaging checks in teleportation safety
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR updates and improves LocationUtil#isBlockDamaging. Notably, the lava check is fixed (it was not working on older versions of Minecraft), many newer materials that were missing damage checks have been added, and the code is a bit cleaner. I've tested this code on MC 1.8 and 1.16 and everything should work correctly.

commit.message: Update block damaging checks in teleportation safety
Alphabetize materials and add wither rose
